metadata.title: Fine Lebanon Country Pendant in Solid 14k Yellow Gold
description: This 14k yellow Gold pendant features the country map of Lebanon. This small Middle Eastern country was first settled around 3000 B.C. by the Phoenicians. It was then, eventually absorbed into the Holy Roman Empire. Lebanon finally gained its independence in 1943, but was unfortunately ravaged by a 15-year civil was that ended in the year 1990. Wear this fine piece of jewelry that signifies wear your from with this pendant that will never lose its flare. Individually hand polished to a lasting high sheen polish finish. This pendant is both of unsurpassed quality and impressive design.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item model number": "QP2176Y-14k-Pendant", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "March 13, 2018", "Manufacturer": "Claddagh Gold", "Country of Origin": "USA"}
